languages.text: Это существо проклято Духом машины. {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Отдача{/g} его оружия увеличена в два раза, а {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} целей против атаках существа увеличены на <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}ИНТ{/g})</u>%.
languages.original_text: This creature is cursed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is doubled, and all their targets gain +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.

languages.text: This creature is cursed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is doubled, and all their targets gain +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.
languages.original_text: Это существо проклято Духом машины. {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Отдача{/g} его оружия увеличена в два раза, а {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} целей против атаках существа увеличены на <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}ИНТ{/g})</u>%.

traits.locale_text: This creature is cursed by the Machine Spirit. The recoil of their weapons is doubled, and all their targets gain +<u>(2 × INT bonus)</u>% to dodge and parry against this creature's attacks.

languages.text: Esta criatura está maldita por el espíritu máquina. El {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} de su arma se duplica y todos sus objetivos ganan +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> % a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}desvío{/g} contra los ataques de esta criatura.
languages.original_text: This creature is cursed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is doubled, and all their targets gain +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura está maldita por el espíritu máquina. El {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} de su arma se duplica y todos sus objetivos ganan +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> % a {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}desvío{/g} contra los ataques de esta criatura.

languages.text: 此生物遭到了机魂诅咒。此生物的武器{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}加倍。所有敌人遭到此生物攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高<u>（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%。
languages.original_text: This creature is cursed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is doubled, and all their targets gain +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.

traits.locale_text: 此生物遭到了机魂诅咒。此生物的武器{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}加倍。所有敌人遭到此生物攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高<u>（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%。

languages.text: この生物は機械精霊の呪いを受ける。彼らの武器の{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}は倍増し、彼らの全てのターゲットはこの生物の攻撃に対して、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}しが+<u>(2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%になる。
languages.original_text: This creature is cursed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is doubled, and all their targets gain +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.

traits.locale_text: この生物は機械精霊の呪いを受ける。彼らの武器の{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}は倍増し、彼らの全てのターゲットはこの生物の攻撃に対して、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ドッジ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}パリィ{/g}しが+<u>(2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%になる。

languages.text: Diese Kreatur ist vom Maschinengeist verflucht. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} ihrer Waffen verdoppelt sich, und alle ihre Ziele haben +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} gegen ihre Angriffe.
languages.original_text: This creature is cursed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is doubled, and all their targets gain +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur ist vom Maschinengeist verflucht. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g}ihrer Waffen verdoppelt sich, und all ihre Ziele erlangen +<u>(2× {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % auf {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} gegen ihre Angriffe.

languages.text: Cette créature est maudite par l'esprit de la machine. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} de ses armes est doublé, et toutes ses cibles bénéficient de +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} contre les attaques de cette créature.
languages.original_text: This creature is cursed by the Machine Spirit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is doubled, and all their targets gain +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature est maudite par l'Esprit de la Machine. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} de ses armes est doublé, et toutes ses cibles bénéficient de +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} contre les attaques de cette créature.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, Makine Ruhu'nca lanetlenmiştir. Silahlarının {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}geri tepmesi{/g} iki katına çıkar ve tüm hedefleri, bu yaratığın saldırılarına karşı +%<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}ZEK{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} kazanır.

The {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} of their weapons is doubled, and all their targets gain +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against this creature's attacks.
